long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring the intense rivalry between Deku and Shigaraki from My Hero Academia, this extension brings the action to your new tab. Quickly access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, customize your experience with links, and stay organized with the integrated calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy the dramatic showdown between Deku and Shigaraki.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access your favorite websites in a flash.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your tab with frequently used links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of your schedule with the built-in calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Effortlessly search the web with your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall quickly via the provided links.
